vote.title: Authorize the City Manager to execute two one-year contracts, each with one option to extend for time only, with Housing Forward, as a sole source, approved as to form by the City Attorney, for the coordination of the Street to Home Initiative enhancing the efforts of the Dallas Real Time Rehousing Program to provide (1) financial assistance, including rental assistance, paid utilities, and supportive services, in an amount not to exceed $1,900,000.00; and (2) supportive services only; in an amount not to exceed $1,096,897.95 to persons experiencing homelessness - Total amount not to exceed $2,996,898.95 - Financing: HOME-ARPA HASS Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
